name: Event AI - WhatsApp RAG GET Only

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  e.event_id,
  e.name,
  e.description,
  e.venue,
  e.date_of_event_start,
  e.date_of_event_end,
  e.status,
  e.user_email,
  CASE 
    WHEN e.forecast_result IS NOT NULL THEN 'Yes'
    ELSE 'No'
  END as has_forecast
FROM events e
WHERE e.status IN ('CREATED', 'ACTIVE')
  AND (e.date_of_event_end > NOW() OR e.status = 'ACTIVE')
ORDER BY e.date_of_event_start ASC
LIMIT 20;
